title: The Silent Rehearsal Stage
prompt: (masterpiece), (best quality), highly detailed anime illustration, 9:16 aspect ratio. A beautiful anime girl violinist standing on an empty wooden stage of a grand baroque opera house. She has long, flowing reddish-brown hair tied with ribbons and wears an elegant, floor-length navy blue dress with subtle gold details. Dramatic stage lighting, large red velvet curtains, opulent gold architectural details, deep shadows over the rows of empty red seats in the background.
